description: This file contains JavaScript code for the Enyo framework, including functions for executing unsafe local functions, loading scripts and stylesheets dynamically, dependency management, and runtime loading queue handling.

methods.name: enyo.execUnsafeLocalFunction
methods.description: Executes a function with restricted platform security, using MSApp on Windows 8 if available.

methods.name: enyo.machine.sheet
methods.description: Loads a stylesheet, handling .less files if necessary.

methods.name: enyo.machine.script
methods.description: Dynamically loads a JavaScript file, with optional onLoad and onError callbacks.

methods.name: enyo.machine.inject
methods.description: Injects JavaScript code directly into the document.

methods.name: enyo.depends
methods.description: Loads dependencies specified as script or style paths, resolving package.js location.

methods.name: enyo.load
methods.description: Queues and manages runtime loading of dependencies with callback support.
